about_the_game:
This expansion for Towers of Altrac unlocks an Endless Mode. You can now show your dominance and defend Altrac as long as your skills allow on your favorite map.

  • All maps can be played in Endless Mode
  • Endless can be played in Multiplayer
  • New endless map with extraordinary waves and new enemies
